nodes.bodyText: This doesn't appear to be used.

This is used to encapsulate the JTA SystemException into a RuntimeException here: https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/14002/files#diff-d003b221f9b819da503954b1f03c63b8ddc7fb18b78c6921cc9ae4d9e1483d1aR370
Is this something that could be useful to other people?

I plan to create a MongoDB test library later on with the two ressources and refactor some integration test to use them.
I'll do it as a followup issue to avoid a too big PR but it's on my todo list ;)
